name: Coconut Lob
description:
You are a lonely coconut-lobber in space, in the nightmare scenario where no one can hear you scream "I'm Walking here!" and all you can do is lob coconuts around a deserted New York city and destroy the buildings in a physics- violating real-world-map replica coconut-lob-o-rama! 

Using Mapbox data in unity.

Version 1.4 "Greg's Cut" now with multiple sounds and improved minimap and also added flames just cause.
